#: This file is used by store-upload.py to modify Store metadata.

baseListing.#: Update the release notes; 2-3 lines shown to Store users before updating
baseListing.releaseNotes:
This update has a new "first launch" experience to help configure your system. If you don't see it, run "py install --configure" to start it manually.

Visit https://github.com/python/pymanager for information and to provide feedback during beta releases.
